trans-unit.source: The XmlSchemaDatatype class is an abstract class for mapping XML Schema definition language (XSD) types to Common Language Runtime (CLR) types.
trans-unit.target: A classe de XmlSchemaDatatype é uma classe abstracta para mapeamento de tipos de idioma (XSD) de definição de esquema XML para tipos de Common Language Runtime (CLR).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called by derived class constructors to initialize state in this type.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor é chamado pelo construtores de classes derivadas para inicializar o estado deste tipo.

trans-unit.source: Converts the value specified, whose type is one of the valid Common Language Runtime (CLR) representations of the XML schema type represented by the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype"></xref>, to the CLR type specified.
trans-unit.target: Converte o valor especificado, cujo tipo é uma das representações Common Language Runtime (CLR) válido do tipo de esquema XML representada pelo <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype"> </xref>, para o tipo CLR especificado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> classes and conversion of XML data types, see the [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o tipo de suporte no <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>classes e conversão de tipos de dados XML, consulte o [tipo suporta as Classes de System.Xml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) tópico.</xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The input value to convert to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: O valor de entrada para converter o tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The target type to convert the input value to.
trans-unit.target: Converter o valor de entrada para o tipo de destino.

trans-unit.source: The converted input value.
trans-unit.target: O valor de entrada convertido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> or <xref:System.Type> parameter is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>ou <xref:System.Type>parâmetro é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The type represented by the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype"></xref> does not support a conversion from type of the value specified to the type specified.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de representado pelo <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype"> </xref> não suporta uma conversão do tipo do valor especificado para o tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: Converts the value specified, whose type is one of the valid Common Language Runtime (CLR) representations of the XML schema type represented by the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype"></xref>, to the CLR type specified using the <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> if the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype"></xref> represents the xs:QName type or a type derived from it.
trans-unit.target: Converte o valor especificado, cujo tipo é uma das representações Common Language Runtime (CLR) válido do tipo de esquema XML representada pelo <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype"> </xref>, para o tipo CLR especificado utilizando o <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>se o <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype"> </xref> representa o tipo de xs:QName ou um tipo derivado do mesmo.</xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>

trans-unit.source: For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> classes and conversion of XML data types, see the [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o tipo de suporte no <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>classes e conversão de tipos de dados XML, consulte o [tipo suporta as Classes de System.Xml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) tópico.</xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The input value to convert to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: O valor de entrada para converter o tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The target type to convert the input value to.
trans-unit.target: Converter o valor de entrada para o tipo de destino.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> used for resolving namespace prefixes.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>utilizado para resolver os prefixos de espaço de nomes.</xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>

trans-unit.source: This is only of use if the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype"></xref> represents the xs:QName type or a type derived from it.
trans-unit.target: Esta é apenas de utilização se o <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype"> </xref> representa o tipo de xs:QName ou um tipo derivado do mesmo.

trans-unit.source: The converted input value.
trans-unit.target: O valor de entrada convertido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> or <xref:System.Type> parameter is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>ou <xref:System.Type>parâmetro é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The type represented by the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype"></xref> does not support a conversion from type of the value specified to the type specified.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de representado pelo <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype"> </xref> não suporta uma conversão do tipo do valor especificado para o tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The IsDerivedFrom method always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O método de IsDerivedFrom sempre devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve sempre <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, validates the <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> specified against a built-in or user-defined simple type.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, valida o <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> especificado em relação a um tipo simples incorporado ou definido pelo utilizador.

trans-unit.source: The ParseValue method validates the `string` specified against a built-in or user-defined simple type.
trans-unit.target: O método ParseValue valida o `string` especificado em relação a um tipo simples incorporado ou definido pelo utilizador.

trans-unit.source: For example, if this <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype> represents the type xs:date, then an instance of <xref:System.DateTime> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se este <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype>representa o tipo xs: Date, em seguida, uma instância de <xref:System.DateTime>é devolvido.</xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype>

trans-unit.source: The following are the steps performed during the ParseValue method's validation process.
trans-unit.target: Seguem-se os passos efetuados durante o processo de validação do método ParseValue.

trans-unit.source: Convert the value specified as a `string` to its corresponding Common Language Runtime (CLR) type.
trans-unit.target: Converter o valor especificado como um `string` escreva a sua correspondente Common Language Runtime (CLR).

trans-unit.source: Verify that the value does not violate any facets defined for the simple type.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o valor não violar as facetas definidas para o tipo simple.

trans-unit.source: The converted value is then returned as an <xref:System.Object> and can be cast safely to the type returned by the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype.ValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor convertido, em seguida, é devolvido como uma <xref:System.Object>e pode ser convertido em segurança para o tipo devolvido pelo <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype.ValueType%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype.ValueType%2A> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype> object represents a list type, the input `string` value is converted to a list of one or more objects.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype>objeto representa um tipo de lista, a entrada `string` é converter o valor para uma lista de um ou mais objetos.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype> object represents a list type, an attempt is made to parse the input value as a member type of the union.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype>objeto representa um tipo de lista, é efetuada uma tentativa para analisar o valor de entrada como um tipo de membro de União.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype>

trans-unit.source: If the parse attempt fails, then the conversion is attempted with the next member of the union until the parse is successful or there are no other member types to parse.
trans-unit.target: Se a tentativa de análise falhar, a conversão é tentada com o seguinte membro de União até que a análise for concluída com êxito ou se existirem outros tipos de membro para analisar.

trans-unit.source: If the parse is unsuccessful, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se a análise for bem-sucedida, é emitida uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> to validate against the simple type.
trans-unit.target: O <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> a validar contra o tipo simple.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable> to use for atomization while parsing the <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype"></xref> object represents the xs:NCName type.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>a utilizar para atomization ao analisar o <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> se <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype"> </xref> objeto representa o tipo de xs:NCName.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object to use while parsing the <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype"></xref> object represents the xs:QName type.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>objeto a utilizar ao analisar o <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> se <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype"> </xref> objeto representa o tipo de xs:QName.</xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that can be cast safely to the type returned by the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype.ValueType*> property.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que pode ser convertido em segurança para o tipo devolvido pelo <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype.ValueType*>propriedade.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype.ValueType*> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The input value is not a valid instance of this W3C XML Schema type.
trans-unit.target: O valor de entrada não é uma instância válida deste tipo de esquema XML W3C.

trans-unit.source: The value to parse cannot be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor para analisar não pode ser <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the type for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> as specified in the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) XML 1.0 specification.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém o tipo para o <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> conforme especificado no XML Consortium World Wide Web (W3C) 1.0 especificação.

trans-unit.source: Allows the `string` to be read as a particular XML type, for example, a CDATA section type.
trans-unit.target: Permite a `string` a ser lido como um determinado tipo XML, por exemplo, um tipo de secção CDATA.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the token types.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte mostra os tipos de token.

trans-unit.source: |XmlTokenizedType|Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`CDATA`|CDATA type| |`ID`|ID type| |`IDREF`|IDREF type| |`IDREFS`|IDREFS type| |`ENTITY`|ENTITY type| |`ENTITIES`|ENTITIES type| |`NMTOKEN`|NMTOKEN type| |`NMTOKENS`|NMTOKENS type| |`NOTATION`|NOTATION type| |`ENUMERATION`|ENUMERATION type| |`QName`|QName type| |`NCName`|NCName type| |`None`|No type|
trans-unit.target: | XmlTokenizedType | Descrição | |----------------------|-----------------| | `CDATA`| Tipo CDATA | | `ID`| Tipo ID | | `IDREF`| Tipo IDREF | | `IDREFS`| Tipo IDREFS | | `ENTITY`| Tipo de entidade | | `ENTITIES`| Tipo de entidades | | `NMTOKEN`| Tipo NMTOKEN | | `NMTOKENS`| Tipo NMTOKENS | | `NOTATION`| Tipo de notação | | `ENUMERATION`| Tipo de ENUMERAÇÃO | | `QName`| Tipo QName | | `NCName`| Tipo de NCName | | `None`| Nenhum tipo |

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlTokenizedType"></xref> value for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlTokenizedType"></xref> value for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlTypeCode"></xref> value for the simple type.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlTypeCode"> </xref> para o tipo simple.

trans-unit.source: W3C XML Schema list types such as xs:ENTITIES, xs:NMTOKENS and xs:IDREFS are not represented by the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlTypeCode> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Lista de esquema XML W3C tipos como xs:ENTITIES, xs:NMTOKENS e xs:IDREFS não são representados pelo <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlTypeCode>enumeração.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlTypeCode>

trans-unit.source: Instead they are represented by the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlTypeCode> values for the xs:ENTITY, xs:NMTOKEN and xs:IDREF types with the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype.Variety%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype> object set to <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatypeVariety>.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, são representados pelos <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlTypeCode>valores para o xs:ENTITY, xs:NMTOKEN e xs:IDREF tipos com a <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype.Variety%2A>propriedade do <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype>objeto definido como <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatypeVariety>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatypeVariety> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype.Variety%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlTypeCode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Both the xs:anySimpleType and xs:anyType types are not represented by <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlTypeCode> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ambos do tipos xs:anySimpleType e xs: anyType não são representados por <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlTypeCode>enumeração.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlTypeCode>

trans-unit.source: These are represented in an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype> object with an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlTypeCode> whose value is <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlTypeCode> for xs:anySimpleType or <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlTypeCode> for xs:anyType.
trans-unit.target: Estes são representados num <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype>objeto com um <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlTypeCode>cujo valor é <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlTypeCode>para xs:anySimpleType ou <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlTypeCode>para xs: anyType.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlTypeCode> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlTypeCode> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlTypeCode> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatype>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlTypeCode"></xref> value for the simple type.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlTypeCode"> </xref> para o tipo simple.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the Common Language Runtime (CLR) type of the item.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém o tipo do Common Language Runtime (CLR) do item.

trans-unit.source: The ValueType property gets the CLR type of the item.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ValueType obtém o tipo CLR do item.

trans-unit.source: For example, an element of type `xs:int` would have a ValueType of <xref:System.Int32> by default.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um elemento do tipo `xs:int` teria um ValueType de <xref:System.Int32>por predefinição.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: However, the ValueType could be any one of the valid types that can be mapped to `xs:int`, such as <xref:System.Int16> or <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, ValueType pode ser qualquer um dos tipos válidos que podem ser mapeadas para `xs:int`, tais como <xref:System.Int16>ou <xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Int16>

trans-unit.source: For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o tipo de suporte no <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>espaço de nomes, consulte [tipo suporta as Classes de System.Xml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The Common Language Runtime (CLR) type of the item.
trans-unit.target: O tipo do Common Language Runtime (CLR) do item.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatypeVariety"></xref> value for the simple type.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatypeVariety"> </xref> para o tipo simple.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatypeVariety"></xref> value for the simple type.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDatatypeVariety"> </xref> para o tipo simple.
